If you sign a petition, your name and state may be included in an electronic file or hard-copy printout delivered to legislators or other policymakers. If you email a member of Congress or other policymaker, submit a comment to a government agency, send a letter-to-the-editor, or take any other action that generates a communication to an outside entity, the information you enter on the action page may be passed along to that outside entity. We may give consultants and organizations working with us on specific projects temporary access to information about our online action-takers. They will not retain the information or contact the people whose information they have access to. We may offer to connect you to other activists or volunteer organizers. Before doing so, we will notify you by email with an option to decline.
